seite.titel: Instructions: Write your own texts. Replace the default images by 'Drag and Drop' or 'Copy and Paste'.
seite.inhalt: This text will be shown on content page

kommentarliste.kommentar: Select image e.g. with the help of the integrated file manager. 'Paste': Right mouse button.
If the album should not start with a single image, additional pages should be created first. Afterwards, this start page can also be deleted without any problems.
